name: Cleansing (Amit Katz)
description:
Trigger warning! The game commemorates the events of the Holocaust.

It's late and you're starting the night shift.
You must remain vigilant and perform all your tasks correctly in order to serve your country and be part of the effort to maintain the purity of the race!

The game is based on the horrifying murders that took place in the Holocaust and is supposed to mention the selection process.

The game is a "One Shot".
It's supposed to create an atmosphere and put the player in an unpleasant and challenging situation.

Operating Instructions:
The game is played with the mouse only.


Gameplay:

This game was made as part of a "Inteructions & Art" course at Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design.
